languages.text: Сквозь переборки, покрытые пятнами гнили, прорастали алые розы, их бутоны кровоточили. Матросы в черной униформе испепеляли их из огнеметов, рыдая черными слезами и хохоча, словно помешанные.

traits.locale_text: Сквозь переборки, покрытые пятнами гнили, прорастали алые розы, их бутоны кровоточии. Матросы в черной униформе испепеляли их из огнеметов, рыдая черными слезами и хохоча, словно помешанные.

languages.text: Scarlet roses, their buds bleeding, were growing through the bulkheads, which were covered with patches of rot. Crew members in black uniforms incinerated them with flame throwers, weeping black tears and roaring with maniacal laughter.
languages.original_text: Сквозь переборки, покрытые пятнами гнили, прорастали алые розы, их бутоны кровоточили. Матросы в черной униформе испепеляли их из огнеметов, рыдая черными слезами и хохоча, словно помешанные.

traits.locale_text: Scarlet roses, their buds bleeding, were growing through the bulkheads, which were covered with patches of rot. Crew members in black uniforms incinerated them with flame throwers, weeping black tears and roaring with maniacal laughter.

Scarlet roses, their buds bleeding, were growing through the bulkheads, which were covered with patches of rot. Crew members in black uniforms incinerated them with flame throwers, weeping black tears and roaring with maniacal laughter.

languages.text: En las mamparas, cubiertas de putrefacción, crecían rosas de color escarlata de cuyos capullos manaba la sangre. Tripulantes ataviados con uniformes negros las incineraron con lanzallamas mientras lloraban lágrimas negras y reían desquiciadamente.
languages.original_text: Scarlet roses, their buds bleeding, were growing through the bulkheads, which were covered with patches of rot. Crew members in black uniforms incinerated them with flame throwers, weeping black tears and roaring with maniacal laughter.

traits.locale_text: En las mamparas, cubiertas de putrefacción, crecían rosas de color escarlata de cuyos capullos manaba la sangre. Tripulantes ataviados con uniformes negros las incineraron con lanzallamas mientras lloraban lágrimas negras y reían desquiciadamente.

languages.text: 猩红的玫瑰带着流血的花蕾，从布满腐斑的舱壁上长出来。穿着黑色制服的船员用火焰喷射器焚烧它们，他们流着黑色的眼泪，发出疯狂的笑声。
languages.original_text: Scarlet roses, their buds bleeding, were growing through the bulkheads, which were covered with patches of rot. Crew members in black uniforms incinerated them with flame throwers, weeping black tears and roaring with maniacal laughter.

traits.locale_text: 猩红的玫瑰带着流血的花蕾，从布满腐斑的舱壁上长出来。穿着黑色制服的船员用火焰喷射器焚烧它们，他们流着黑色的眼泪，发出疯狂的笑声。

languages.text: 緋色のバラはその蕾から血を流し、腐ってできた斑点だらけの隔壁を突き抜けて伸びていた。黒い服を着たクルー達が火炎放射器で焼却すると、バラは黒い涙を流して狂ったような笑い声をあげた。
languages.original_text: Scarlet roses, their buds bleeding, were growing through the bulkheads, which were covered with patches of rot. Crew members in black uniforms incinerated them with flame throwers, weeping black tears and roaring with maniacal laughter.

traits.locale_text: 緋色のバラはその蕾から血を流し、腐ってできた斑点だらけの隔壁を突き抜けて伸びていた。黒い服を着たクルー達が火炎放射器で焼却すると、バラは黒い涙を流して狂ったような笑い声をあげた。

languages.text: Scharlachrote Rosen, deren Knospen bluteten, wuchsen durch die Schotten, die mit Fäulnisflecken übersät waren. Besatzungsmitglieder in schwarzen Uniformen verbrannten sie mit Flammenwerfern, weinten schwarze Tränen und lachten wie wahnsinnig.
languages.original_text: Scarlet roses, their buds bleeding, were growing through the bulkheads, which were covered with patches of rot. Crew members in black uniforms incinerated them with flame throwers, weeping black tears and roaring with maniacal laughter.

languages.text: Des roses écarlates aux bourgeons sanguinolents poussaient à travers les cloisons recouvertes de pourriture. Des membres d'équipage en uniformes noirs les incinéraient à l'aide de lance-flammes, des larmes sombres coulant sur les visages pris d'un rire hystérique.
languages.original_text: Scarlet roses, their buds bleeding, were growing through the bulkheads, which were covered with patches of rot. Crew members in black uniforms incinerated them with flame throwers, weeping black tears and roaring with maniacal laughter.

traits.locale_text: Des roses écarlates aux bourgeons sanguinolents poussaient à travers les cloisons recouvertes de pourriture. Des membres d'équipage en uniformes noirs les incinéraient à l'aide de lance-flammes, des larmes sombres coulant sur les visages pris d'un rire hystérique.

languages.text: Çürümüşlük izleriyle kaplı bölme panellerinde, tomurcuklarından kan damlayan kırmızı güller açıyordu. Kara üniformalı tayfalar, onları alevsaçanlarla yakıyor, kapkara gözyaşları döküp çılgınca kahkahalara boğuluyordu.
languages.original_text: Scarlet roses, their buds bleeding, were growing through the bulkheads, which were covered with patches of rot. Crew members in black uniforms incinerated them with flame throwers, weeping black tears and roaring with maniacal laughter.

traits.locale_text: Çürümüşlük izleriyle kaplı bölme panellerinde, tomurcuklarından kan akan kırmızı güller açıyor. Siyah üniformalı tayfalar, onları alev püskürten silahlarıyla yakıyor, siyah gözyaşları döküyor ve çılgınca kahkahalara boğuluyor.
